alert.note: Alert for Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:50PM CDT until July 28 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL VERNON AND NORTHERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 849 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Richland Center, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Richland Center around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads D And N N, Ithaca, Loyd, Bunker Hill, Highway 58 And County B, Germantown and Highway 80 And County C C. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
